welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Antonio, Costa Rica! Prepare to be enchanted by the city's vibrant culture, beautiful landscapes, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and experience all that this charming city has to offer."

restaurants.name: Ram's Grill House
restaurants.description: Ram's Grill House is a filipino restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: New Ocean View Bar
restaurants.description: New Ocean View Bar is a seafood restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Juan Santamaría International Airport is used exclusively for domestic flights within Costa Rica.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Tobias Bolaños International Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guapiles Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Guapiles Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
